sentences.sContent: On the astrolabe, an off - centered circle represents the orbit of the sun - the ecliptic.
sentences.sContent_eng: On the astrolabe, an off - centered circle represents the orbit of the sun - the ecliptic.
sentences.sCn: 在星盘上， 一个偏心的圆代表了太阳的运行轨道――黄道。

sentences.sContent: Recall that vernal equinox is one of the two intersection points of the celestial equator and the ecliptic.
sentences.sContent_eng: Recall that vernal equinox is one of the two intersection points of the celestial equator and the ecliptic.
sentences.sCn: 赤经计算的起点为春分点，相信你仍记得春分点是天球赤道和黄道的其中一个相交点。

sentences.sContent: Because the Moon and bright planets wander through the sky near the ecliptic plane, such occultation events are not uncommon, but they are dramatic, especially in telescopic views.
sentences.sContent_eng: Because the Moon and bright planets wander through the sky near the ecliptic plane, such occultation events are not uncommon, but they are dramatic, especially in telescopic views.
sentences.sCn: 因为月球和明亮的行星出现在天空中黄道平面附近，这种掩星事件也很平常，但是它们也很富有戏剧性，特别是在望远镜影像里。

remMethod.val: ec(没有) + lip(离开) + tic → 因离开而没有了 → 日(或月)食的

trans.tranOther: the path along which the Sun seems to move
